description:
Beautifully experience all your photos in one place, no matter where they are stored.

Access and enjoy all your photos within one app: Camera Roll, Instagram, Facebook, Flickr, Picasa, Google+, Google Drive, Twitter, Tumblr, and many others. Or endlessly discover your friends’ photos from social networks.

“It sure is fun to browse like this,” says TechCrunch. Fast and fluid, the app features our stunning 3D photo wall, which lets you fly through thousands of photos in seconds. 

Reviews and accolades:
- "A gallery app to rule them all" — MobileBurn
- "600 million reasons for Cooliris" — The Next Web
- "A slick application for browsing photos" — The Guardian
- "Useful and compelling" — Forbes
- "This is really awesome" — Robert Scoble
- "App of the Day...It’s great" — ABC News
- "This is perfect" — Gizmodo
_________________________________________

FEATURES

ALL YOUR FAVORITE PHOTO SOURCES IN ONE APP
* iPad, iPhone library 
* Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr 
* Flickr, Picasa, SmugMug 
* Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive, Evernote 
* Sina Weibo, Tencent Weibo, Yandex.Fotki, Yandex.Disk 
* Google Image Search, Yandex Image Search 

FUN, USEFUL, EASY TO USE
* Get photos from all your favorite photo sources in one place.
* Share photos to your favorite social network. 
* See photos from Facebook friends, Instagram followers, and Flickr contacts.
* Fast, fluid, and stunning 3D Wall photo experience.
* Ridiculously simple yet powerful user interface.

_________________________________________

GOT FEEDBACK OR NEED TO REPORT A BUG?
Email us at team@cooliris.com
